Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 38th overall pick, by Cleveland in 1989...
Injured on 8/2/1990 with a Broken Finger, out for 6 weeks...
Had first career hit on 7/17/1992, off Andy Rincon (MIN)...
Hit first career homerun on 7/19/1992, off Jeff Stember (BOS)...
Injured on 9/9/1993 with a Inflamed Thigh Muscle, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by Minnesota on 2/1/1998 to a 4-year deal worth $4,000,000 per year...
